Value.label: Status on turn on the bulb after turning off
Dimming Step Level
Value.Help: You may change the dimming step level when you adjust the brightness by your controller. Low -> gradual, High -> Rapid

Value.label: Dimming Step Timing
Value.Help: You may change the dimming speed quicker or slower by changin this parameter. Low -> quick, High -> slow

Group.label: Group #1 for lifeline communications. Max associations=5. Lifeline association only supports the manual reset event.
